## {#presentation-feedback data-menu-title="Presentation feedback"}

[Peer presentation feedback]{.slide-title}

<hr>

[Take turns listening to your partner's presentation and make note of / share the following:]{.body-text-m}

<br>

- Timing (should be 3 min)?
- Pacing (too fast / too slow / just right)?
- Is the research question(s) clearly articulated? 
- Is it clear how the data are being used to answer the research question(s)?
- Are the key insights clearly articulated? Do they align with the presenter's goals?
- Does the order of information, as presented, make sense?
- One thing that the presenter does really well?
- One suggestion for making this presentation even better?
